thread.title: India Weather Forecast Today, 03 January Live Updates: Around 70 flights delayed in Delhi, sub-zero temperature in Jammu and Kashmir

author: @indianexpress
title: India Weather Forecast Today, 03 January Live Updates: Around 70 flights delayed in Delhi, sub-zero temperature in Jammu and Kashmir
text:
12:36 (IST) 3 Jan 2025 India Weather Forecast Today Live Updates: Check weather forecast here India Meteorological Department's forecast is here:
Light isolated to scattered rainfall or snowfall over Western Himalayan region till Saturday and scattered to fairly widespread rainfall or snowfall over the region from Sunday to January 6. Heavy rainfall or snowfall at isolated places also likely over Jammu Kashmir, Ladakh, Gilgit, Baltistan, Muzaffarabad on Sunday and Monday.
Light isolated to scattered rainfall also likely over the plains of Northwest India from Saturday to January 6.
Isolated thunderstorm accompanied with lightning also likely over Jammu-Kashmir-Ladakh-Gilgit-Baltistan-Muzaffarabad and Himachal Pradesh on January 5 and 6.
